snippet: SIMON--Sylvia F.,age 89, died January 3 at her home in Rye, NY. Beloved wife of the late Franklin Simon II. Devoted mother of Cici Holbrook and Leslie Simon. Dear grandmother of William Holbrook and Douglas McClure. Adoring great- grandmother of William and Thomas Holbrook. The family will receive friends at the Graham Funeral Home in Rye, NY on Thursday from 4pm to 7pm. A Mass of Christian Burial will be held on Friday at the Church of the Resurrection at 10am. Entombment to follow at Woodlawn Cemetery, Bronx, NY. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SIMON--Sylvia F.,age 89, died January 3 at her home in Rye, NY. Beloved wife of the late Franklin Simon II. Devoted mother of Cici Holbrook and Leslie Simon. headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SIMON, SYLVIA F.
